effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Treads of the Nerubian Twins

Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,694 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 261,557 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,066 Agility and absorbing 1.3 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Lamplighter

spells.description: Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Twinblades of the Deceiver

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 245,730 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 68,259 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Twinblades of the Deceiver
